Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>


::Shadow Wing::

She felt her spark disintegrate.  She wanted to be reprogrammed.  She hated 
being this emotional owl bot.  She hated her feelings and wasted emotions.  
This was her greatest weakness and she knew it.  She hated Lunarpine for 
showing her this weakness inside of her.  She couldn't hate him really.  
What she really hated was herself.  Lunarpine showed her just how weak she 
really was.    She knew better than to think a wolf and an owl could have 
ever had a chance.  She knew that he would never give her a chance again.  
She had her one chance and blew it.  She realized that because of her 
weakness, she could jeopardize the others.

She thought that if her emotions were her weakness, that she was the 
weakness to the whole group.  SHe knew what she had to do.  She resolved 
that even if she gets herself killed, she won't endanger her friends. She 
stood up and looked in the mirror over the sink in her room.  She thought of 
Lunarpine.  She didn't want to jeopardize him either.  She would sneak out 
in the middle of the night, when she would go hunting, and simply not 
return. She had survived in the wilderness in her beast mode.  She could do 
it again.  Better to die in the wood alone than to cost her friend thier 
lives.  She made up her mind and waited in her room untill night fall.
